parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Vehicle in which given unit is mounted. If none, unit is returned. Alternatively, use [[objectParent]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''vehicle''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> SQS <code>? '''vehicle''' [[player]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>!=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[player]] : [[hint]] "Player is in a vehicle"</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> SQF<code>if ([[vehicle]] [[player]] != [[player]]) [[then]] {[[hint]] "Player is in a vehicle"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[objectParent]]
</value></part></template>
